response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance for us. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you, and we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We believe this is an exceptional deal that will not only benefit you financially but also align with your needs and aspirations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
